titles.title: Women's Health Drug Studies Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to provide for research on whether drugs approved under such Act for human use affect women differently than men, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 8/2/2001--Introduced. Women's Health Drug Studies Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to require that sponsors and holders of certain pending or approved drug applications either conduct or support research to obtain information on whether the drugs affect females differently than males.
